com.xith3d.scenegraph
Class BoundingSphere

java.lang.Object
  com.xith3d.spatial.bounds.Sphere
      com.xith3d.scenegraph.BoundingSphere
All Implemented Interfaces:
Bounds, Classifier, Serializable
public class BoundingSphere
extends Sphere
implements Bounds

A spherical bounding volume. It has two associated values: the center point and the radius of the sphere.

See Also:
Serialized Form
